Home.p-1: My name is Mathurin Sekine. I am currently a student at Ada Tech School in Nantes, France, working towards becoming a front-end developer.
Home.p-2: Since starting to learn to code in 2023, I began developing Untitled Presentation App, as well as a small game, a dataviz website, and a Chrome extension.
Home.p-3: I also like all things design, you can see more of my work on Dribbble or Layers.
